mapper.select: SELECT id,factory_name AS name FROM BMS_NA_BASE_FACTORY WHERE delete_flag='0'

SELECT o.id,o.factory_name name FROM BMS_NA_BASE_FACTORY o WHERE o.delete_flag = '0' and o.capacity>0
AND (locate(o.factory_code, (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(R.permission_value) FROM BMS_NA_BASE_USER_ROLE R WHERE R.staff_number = #{staff_number} AND R.permission_key = '1' AND R.role_id IN (SELECT RP.role_id FROM BMS_NA_BASE_ROLE_PERMISSION RP WHERE RP.function_id = (SELECT ID FROM BMS_NA_BASE_FUNCTION F WHERE F.function_url = #{function_url}))) )>0 OR ((SELECT IFNULL(GROUP_CONCAT(R.permission_value),'') FROM BMS_NA_BASE_USER_ROLE R WHERE R.staff_number = #{staff_number} AND R.permission_key = '1' AND R.role_id IN (SELECT RP.role_id FROM BMS_NA_BASE_ROLE_PERMISSION RP WHERE RP.function_id = (SELECT ID FROM BMS_NA_BASE_FUNCTION F WHERE F.function_url = #{function_url}))) = '') )
SELECT o.id,o.factory_name name FROM BMS_NA_BASE_FACTORY o WHERE o.delete_flag = '0'
select id,bus_type_code name,internal_name code from BMS_NA_BASE_BUS_TYPE group by bus_type_code
SELECT id,key_name,key_name_en,value from BMS_NA_BASE_KEY where delete_flag='0' and key_code=#{keyCode}
SELECT id, foreign_id AS factory_id, name FROM BMS_NA_BASE_ORG where parent_id = (select id from BMS_NA_BASE_ORG where foreign_id = #{factory_id} and org_type = 2) and org_type = 3
SELECT DISTINCT FUNCTION_URL FROM BMS_NA_BASE_FUNCTION

SELECT DISTINCT FUNCTION_URL FROM BMS_NA_BASE_FUNCTION F WHERE F.id IN (SELECT DISTINCT FUNCTION_ID FROM BMS_NA_BASE_ROLE_PERMISSION P WHERE P.role_id IN (SELECT DISTINCT ROLE_ID FROM BMS_NA_BASE_USER_ROLE R WHERE R.staff_number = #{staff_number}))
SELECT id,workshop_name AS name FROM BMS_NA_BASE_WORKSHOP WHERE delete_flag='0'

SELECT o.id org_id,o.foreign_id id,o.name FROM BMS_NA_BASE_ORG o LEFT JOIN BMS_NA_BASE_ORG o1 ON o.parent_id=o1.id WHERE o.org_type='2' and o1.name=#{factory} and o.deleted='0'
and o.org_kind=#{org_kind}
AND (locate(o.org_code, (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(R.permission_value) FROM BMS_NA_BASE_USER_ROLE R WHERE R.staff_number = #{staff_number} AND R.permission_key = '2' AND R.role_id IN (SELECT RP.role_id FROM BMS_NA_BASE_ROLE_PERMISSION RP WHERE RP.function_id = (SELECT ID FROM BMS_NA_BASE_FUNCTION F WHERE F.function_url = #{function_url}))) )>0 OR ((SELECT IFNULL(GROUP_CONCAT(R.permission_value),'') FROM BMS_NA_BASE_USER_ROLE R WHERE R.staff_number = #{staff_number} AND R.permission_key = '2' AND R.role_id IN (SELECT RP.role_id FROM BMS_NA_BASE_ROLE_PERMISSION RP WHERE RP.function_id = (SELECT ID FROM BMS_NA_BASE_FUNCTION F WHERE F.function_url = #{function_url}))) = '') )
and o.name like concat('%',#{workshop},'%')
SELECT * FROM BMS_NA_BASE_KEY WHERE key_code = 'ABNORMAL_REASON'
SELECT id,line AS name FROM BMS_NA_BASE_LINE WHERE delete_flag='0' order by line

select distinct p.line as name from BMS_NA_BASE_STATION p where p.factory=#{factory} and p.workshop=#{workshop}
AND (locate(o.org_code, (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(R.permission_value) FROM BMS_NA_BASE_USER_ROLE R WHERE R.staff_number = #{staff_number} AND R.permission_key = '2' AND R.role_id IN (SELECT RP.role_id FROM BMS_NA_BASE_ROLE_PERMISSION RP WHERE RP.function_id = (SELECT ID FROM BMS_NA_BASE_FUNCTION F WHERE F.function_url = #{function_url}))) )>0 OR ((SELECT IFNULL(GROUP_CONCAT(R.permission_value),'') FROM BMS_NA_BASE_USER_ROLE R WHERE R.staff_number = #{staff_number} AND R.permission_key = '2' AND R.role_id IN (SELECT RP.role_id FROM BMS_NA_BASE_ROLE_PERMISSION RP WHERE RP.function_id = (SELECT ID FROM BMS_NA_BASE_FUNCTION F WHERE F.function_url = #{function_url}))) = '') )
SELECT id,workshop_name AS name FROM BMS_NA_BASE_WORKSHOP
SELECT id,order_config_name name FROM BMS_NA_OR_ORDER_CONFIG WHERE order_id=#{order_id}
select id,parts_name name,parts_code code,parts_type type from BMS_NA_BASE_PARTS where parts_name like CONCAT('%',#{parts},'%') and status !='1'

select b.bus_number,b.order_id,b.order_config_id,b.factory_id, concat(o.order_no,' ',o.order_name,t.bus_type_code,' ',o.order_qty,'台') order_desc from BMS_NA_PLAN_BUS b left join BMS_NA_OR_ORDER o on b.order_id=o.id left join BMS_NA_BASE_BUS_TYPE t on o.bus_type_id=t.id where b.bus_number LIKE CONCAT('%',#{bus_input},'%') order by b.bus_number desc limit 20

SELECT o.foreign_id id,o.name,o.id org_id FROM BMS_NA_BASE_ORG o LEFT JOIN BMS_NA_BASE_ORG o1 ON o.parent_id=o1.id LEFT JOIN BMS_NA_BASE_ORG o2 on o1.parent_id=o2.id WHERE o.org_type='3' and o1.name = #{workshop} and o.deleted='0' and o2.name=#{factory}
and o.name like concat('%',#{workgroup},'%')

SELECT s.factory,s.workshop,s.station_code,s.station_name id,CONCAT(s.station_code,'：',s.station_name) name,s.monitory_point_flag,s.key_station_flag,s.quality_monitory_flag FROM BMS_NA_BASE_STATION s WHERE 1=1 AND s.factory = #{factory} AND s.workshop = #{workshop} GROUP BY s.factory,s.workshop,s.station_name ORDER BY LEFT(s.station_code,1),cast(RIGHT(s.station_code,1) as signed)

SELECT o.foreign_id id,o.name,o.id org_id FROM BMS_NA_BASE_ORG o LEFT JOIN BMS_NA_BASE_ORG o1 ON o.parent_id=o1.id LEFT JOIN BMS_NA_BASE_ORG o2 on o1.parent_id=o2.id LEFT JOIN BMS_NA_BASE_ORG o3 on o2.parent_id=o3.id WHERE o.org_type='4' and o1.name =#{workgroup} and o.deleted='0' and o2.name=#{workshop} and o3.name=#{factory}

SELECT concat('{"workshop":"',o1.name,'","workgroup_list":[',group_concat('{"id":"',o.foreign_id,'","name":"',o.name,'"}'),']}') workgroup_list FROM BMS_NA_BASE_ORG o LEFT JOIN BMS_NA_BASE_ORG o1 ON o.parent_id=o1.id LEFT JOIN BMS_NA_BASE_ORG o2 on o1.parent_id=o2.id WHERE o.org_type='3' and find_in_set(o1.name,#{workshop_list})>0 and o.deleted='0' and o2.name=#{factory} group by o1.name
select * from BMS_NA_BASE_USER where card_8H10D=#{cardId}

SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into BMS_NA_BASE_TASK (task_type_id,url,param,count,finish_count,role_id,staff_number,factory_code,workshop_name,editor_id,edit_date) values (#{task_type_id},#{url},#{param},#{count},#{finish_count},#{role_id},#{staff_number},#{factory_code},#{workshop_name},#{editor_id},#{edit_date})
mapper.select: select name from BMS_NA_HR_STAFF where staff_number=#{staff_number}

select * from (select count(b.bus_number) warehouse_qty from BMS_NA_OR_ORDER o left join BMS_NA_PLAN_BUS b on b.order_id=o.id and b.warehousing_date>0 where o.productive_year=#{actYear}) a, (select (a.order_qty-b.start_qty) as unstart_qty from (select sum(o.order_qty) order_qty from BMS_NA_OR_ORDER o where o.productive_year=#{actYear} and o.order_type !='KD件') a, (select count(b.bus_number) start_qty from BMS_NA_PLAN_BUS b where b.welding_online_date>0 and substring_index(substring_index(b.bus_number,'-',3),'-',-1) =#{actYear}) b) b, (select count(b.bus_number) producting_qty from BMS_NA_OR_ORDER o left join BMS_NA_PLAN_BUS b on b.order_id=o.id and b.welding_online_date>0 and b.warehousing_date<=0 where o.productive_year=#{actYear}) c, (select count(b.bus_number) dispatch_qty from BMS_NA_OR_ORDER o left join BMS_NA_PLAN_BUS b on b.order_id=o.id and b.dispatch_date>0 where o.productive_year=#{actYear}) d

select a.*,ifnull(b.finished_qty,0) finished_qty from (select sum(p.plan_qty) plan_qty,k.key_name from BMS_NA_PLAN_PRODUCTION_PLAN p left join BMS_NA_BASE_KEY k on p.plan_code_value=k.value and k.key_code='PLAN_CODE' where p.factory_id=#{factory_id} and p.plan_date=#{query_date} and k.key_name in('焊装上线','涂装上线','底盘上线','总装下线') group by k.key_name) a left join (select count(b.id) finished_qty,'焊装上线' key_name from BMS_NA_PLAN_BUS b where b.factory_id=#{factory_id} and b.welding_online_date like concat('%',#{query_date},'%') union select count(b.id) finished_qty,'涂装上线' key_name from BMS_NA_PLAN_BUS b where b.factory_id=#{factory_id} and b.painting_online_date like concat('%',#{query_date},'%') union select count(b.id) finished_qty,'底盘上线' key_name from BMS_NA_PLAN_BUS b where b.factory_id=#{factory_id} and b.chassis_online_date like concat('%',#{query_date},'%') union select count(b.id) finished_qty,'总装下线' key_name from BMS_NA_PLAN_BUS b where b.factory_id=#{factory_id} and b.assembly_offline_date like concat('%',#{query_date},'%') ) b on b.key_name=a.key_name

select tmp.order_desc,round(sum(tmp.finished_qty)/sum(tmp.production_qty)*100,2) as order_rate, group_concat('{"factory_name":"',tmp.factory_name,'","factory_rate":"',round(tmp.finished_qty/tmp.production_qty*100,2),'"}') factory_rate_list from( select count(distinct b.bus_number) finished_qty,fo.production_qty,fo.order_id,f.factory_name,concat(o.order_name,t.bus_type_code,' ',o.order_qty,'台') order_desc from BMS_NA_OR_FACTORY_ORDER fo left join BMS_NA_OR_ORDER o on fo.order_id=o.id left join BMS_NA_BASE_BUS_TYPE t on t.id=o.bus_type_id left join BMS_NA_PLAN_BUS b on fo.order_id=b.order_id and fo.factory_id=b.factory_id and b.warehousing_date>0 left join BMS_NA_BASE_FACTORY f on f.id=fo.factory_id where fo.order_id in( select order_id from (select count(distinct b.id) finished_qty,fo.production_qty,fo.order_id from BMS_NA_OR_FACTORY_ORDER fo left join BMS_NA_PLAN_BUS b on fo.order_id=b.order_id and fo.factory_id=b.factory_id and b.warehousing_date>0 where fo.factory_id=#{factory_id} group by fo.order_id,fo.factory_id) tmp where tmp.finished_qty<tmp.production_qty ) and fo.status in ('0','1') group by fo.order_id,fo.factory_id order by fo.order_id) tmp group by tmp.order_id

select group_concat(a.month,':',a.finished_qty order by a.month separator ',') month_count,a.bus_type from(select count(b.bus_number) finished_qty,substr(b.bus_number,1,2) bus_type,cast(substr(substring_index(b.warehousing_date,'-',2),-2) as signed) month from BMS_NA_PLAN_BUS b where b.warehousing_date like concat(#{actYear},'%') group by substr(b.bus_number,1,2),substr(substring_index(b.warehousing_date,'-',2),-2)) a group by a.bus_type

select group_concat(a.factory_name,':',a.finished_qty order by a.month separator ',') factory_count,a.month from(select count(b.bus_number) finished_qty,f.factory_name,cast(substr(substring_index(b.warehousing_date,'-',2),-2) as signed) month from BMS_NA_PLAN_BUS b left join BMS_NA_BASE_FACTORY f on f.id=b.factory_id where b.warehousing_date like concat(#{actYear},'%') group by b.factory_id,substr(substring_index(b.warehousing_date,'-',2),-2)) a group by a.month

SELECT concat(f.factory_name,w.workshop_name,'车间',st.line,'线从',st.start_time,'开始停线，', case when st.pend_time>0 then concat('预计',st.pend_time,'恢复，') else '' end, '停线原因：',st.detailed_reason) message FROM BMS_NA_PLAN_STOPLINE st LEFT JOIN BMS_NA_BASE_FACTORY f on f.id=st.factory_id LEFT JOIN BMS_NA_BASE_WORKSHOP w on st.workshop_id=w.id WHERE st.end_time<=0 and f.factory_name=#{factory} UNION ALL SELECT concat(e.factory,e.workshop,'车间',e.line,'车号为：',e.bus_number,'车辆因',k.key_name,'发生异常，异常从',e.start_time,'开始，', case when e.pfinish_time>0 then concat('预计',e.pfinish_time,'恢复，') else '' end, '异常详细原因：',e.detailed_reasons) message FROM BMS_NA_PD_PRODUCTION_EXCEPTION e LEFT JOIN BMS_NA_BASE_KEY k on k.id=e.reason_type_id WHERE e.status='0' and e.factory=#{factory}
select count(s.staff_number)staff_count,s.plant_org from BMS_NA_HR_STAFF s where s.status='在职' and s.salary_type='计件' group by s.plant_org

select group_concat(tmp.workshop_org,':',tmp.staff_count) staff_count_detail,tmp.plant_org from( select count(s.staff_number)staff_count,s.plant_org,s.workshop_org from BMS_NA_HR_STAFF s where s.status='在职' and s.salary_type='计件' group by s.plant_org,s.workshop_org) tmp group by tmp.plant_org

>CONCAT(date_add(#{curDate},interval '-1' DAY),' 17:30:00') and b.factory_id=#{factoryId} group by p.line union all select CONCAT('底盘','下线') process_node,count(b.bus_number) process_num, p.line from BMS_NA_PLAN_BUS b left join BMS_NA_BASE_PROCESS p on b.latest_process_id=p.id where b.chassis_offline_date <=CONCAT(#{curDate},' 17:30:00') and b.chassis_offline_date select tmp2.process_node,ifnull(tmp1.plan_total,0) plan_total,ifnull(tmp2.online_num,0) done_num from( select sum(p.plan_qty) plan_total,k.key_name process_node from BMS_NA_PLAN_PRODUCTION_PLAN p left join BMS_NA_BASE_KEY k on p.plan_code_value=k.value and k.key_code='PLAN_CODE' where p.factory_id=#{factoryId} and p.plan_date=#{curDate} and k.key_name = CONCAT(#{workshop},'上线') group by k.key_name) tmp1 right join ( select CONCAT(#{workshop},'上线') process_node,count(b.bus_number) online_num from BMS_NA_PLAN_BUS b where
b.welding_online_date <=CONCAT(#{curDate},' 17:30:00') and b.welding_online_date >CONCAT(date_add(#{curDate},interval '-1' DAY),' 17:30:00')
b.painting_online_date <=CONCAT(#{curDate},' 17:30:00') and b.painting_online_date >CONCAT(date_add(#{curDate},interval '-1' DAY),' 17:30:00')
b.chassis_online_date <=CONCAT(#{curDate},' 17:30:00') and b.chassis_online_date >CONCAT(date_add(#{curDate},interval '-1' DAY),' 17:30:00')
b.assembly_online_date <=CONCAT(#{curDate},' 17:30:00') and b.assembly_online_date >CONCAT(date_add(#{curDate},interval '-1' DAY),' 17:30:00')
b.testline_online_date <=CONCAT(#{curDate},' 17:30:00') and b.testline_online_date >CONCAT(date_add(#{curDate},interval '-1' DAY),' 17:30:00')
and b.factory_id=#{factoryId} )tmp2 on tmp1.process_node=tmp2.process_node union all select tmp3.process_node,ifnull(tmp1.plan_total,0) plan_tota,ifnull(tmp3.offline_num,0) done_num from( select sum(p.plan_qty) plan_total,k.key_name process_node from BMS_NA_PLAN_PRODUCTION_PLAN p left join BMS_NA_BASE_KEY k on p.plan_code_value=k.value and k.key_code='PLAN_CODE' where p.plan_date=#{curDate} and k.key_name = CONCAT(#{workshop},'下线')
and p.factory_id=#{factoryId}
group by k.key_name) tmp1 right join ( select CONCAT(#{workshop},'下线') process_node,count(b.bus_number) offline_num from BMS_NA_PLAN_BUS b where
b.welding_offline_date <=CONCAT(#{curDate},' 17:30:00') and b.welding_offline_date >CONCAT(date_add(#{curDate},interval '-1' DAY),' 17:30:00')
b.painting_offline_date <=CONCAT(#{curDate},' 17:30:00') and b.painting_offline_date >CONCAT(date_add(#{curDate},interval '-1' DAY),' 17:30:00')

b.assembly_offline_date <=CONCAT(#{curDate},' 17:30:00') and b.assembly_offline_date >CONCAT(date_add(#{curDate},interval '-1' DAY),' 17:30:00')
b.testline_offline_date <=CONCAT(#{curDate},' 17:30:00') and b.testline_offline_date >CONCAT(date_add(#{curDate},interval '-1' DAY),' 17:30:00')

and b.factory_id=#{factoryId}
)tmp3 on tmp1.process_node=tmp3.process_node;

select t.result_judge, t.bus_number,t.edit_date item,k.key_name workshop_name,t.factory_id,t.test_node_id from BMS_NA_QM_TEST_CARD t left join BMS_NA_BASE_KEY k on k.id=t.test_node_id where t.result_judge ='不合格' and t.test_date=#{curDate} and t.factory_id=#{factoryId} group by t.test_date,k.key_name ,t.factory_id

select round(count(t1.bus_number)/count(t.bus_number)*100,2) pass_rate, t.factory_id,k.key_name workshop_name,t.edit_date item from BMS_NA_QM_TEST_CARD t left join BMS_NA_QM_TEST_CARD t1 on t.id=t1.id and t1.result='0' left join BMS_NA_BASE_KEY k on k.id=t.test_node_id where t.test_date=#{curDate} and t.factory_id=#{factoryId} group by t.factory_id,k.key_name,t.edit_date

SELECT * FROM (SELECT COUNT(id) AS welding_count FROM BMS_NA_PLAN_BUS WHERE factory_id = #{factoryId} AND welding_online_date IS NOT NULL AND welding_offline_date IS NULL) a, (SELECT COUNT(id) AS fiberglass_count FROM BMS_NA_PLAN_BUS WHERE factory_id = #{factoryId} AND welding_offline_date IS NOT NULL AND fiberglass_offline_date IS NULL) b, (SELECT COUNT(id) AS painting_count FROM BMS_NA_PLAN_BUS WHERE factory_id = #{factoryId} AND painting_online_date IS NOT NULL AND painting_offline_date IS NULL) c, (SELECT COUNT(id) AS chassis_count FROM BMS_NA_PLAN_BUS WHERE factory_id = #{factoryId} AND chassis_online_date IS NOT NULL AND chassis_offline_date IS NULL) d, (SELECT COUNT(id) AS assembly_count FROM BMS_NA_PLAN_BUS WHERE factory_id = #{factoryId} AND assembly_online_date IS NOT NULL AND assembly_offline_date IS NULL) e, (SELECT COUNT(id) AS debugarea_count FROM BMS_NA_PLAN_BUS WHERE factory_id = #{factoryId} AND debugarea_online_date IS NOT NULL AND debugarea_offline_date IS NULL) f, (SELECT COUNT(id) AS testline_count FROM BMS_NA_PLAN_BUS WHERE factory_id = #{factoryId} AND testline_online_date IS NOT NULL AND testline_offline_date IS NULL) g, (SELECT COUNT(id) AS warehousing_count FROM BMS_NA_PLAN_BUS WHERE factory_id = #{factoryId} AND warehousing_date IS NOT NULL AND dispatch_date IS NULL ) h

select t1.online_total-t2.offline_total as balance from (select ifnull(sum(offline_real_qty),0) online_total from BMS_NA_PD_PARTS_PLAN_FINISH f left join BMS_NA_BASE_KEY k on f.parts_id=k.id where k.key_name='喷砂' and f.factory_id=#{factoryId}) t1, (select ifnull(count(distinct b.bus_number),0) offline_total from BMS_NA_PLAN_BUS b where b.factory_id=#{factoryId} and b.welding_online_date is not null) t2
call P_QueryOrgTreeList(#{staff_number},#{url},#{org_type},#{org_kind})
SELECT staff_number,staff_name FROM BMS_NA_HR_PIECE_SALARY_HISTORY WHERE month=#{month} AND submit_factory=#{factory} AND submit_workshop=#{workshop} AND status in('已提交','已结算')

select p.* from BMS_NA_HR_HOUR_PRICE p left join BMS_NA_BASE_FACTORY f on f.id=p.factory_id where f.factory_name=#{factory} and effective_date<=#{workDate} and hour_type=(SELECT x.value FROM BMS_NA_BASE_KEY x WHERE x.key_code='HOUR_PRICE' AND x.key_name = (SELECT k.key_name FROM BMS_NA_BASE_KEY k WHERE k.key_code='WAIT_HOUR_TYPE' AND k.value= #{type})) order by edit_date desc limit 1
select o.* from BMS_NA_BASE_ORG o left join BMS_NA_BASE_ORG o1 on o.parent_id=o1.id where o1.id=#{parentOrgId} and o.deleted='0' order by o.sort_number asc
SELECT distinct r.role_name FROM BMS_NA_BASE_USER_ROLE ur LEFT JOIN BMS_NA_BASE_ROLE r on ur.role_id=r.id WHERE ur.staff_number=#{staff_number}
